docstring.long_description:
Inputs
------
v : Vector
    The input vector to return subset of values from
docstring.short_description: The VECTOR_SUBSET node returns the subset of values from requested indices

parameters.name: indices
parameters.description: specified indices to extract values at from the input vector

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: number of elements to extract from the input vector, default is 1 (this only applies when one index is specified for indices parameter)

returns.description: The new vector with subset of elements extracted from the input vector
